website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed boot with a sleek design that keeps feet dry. Doesn't have as much warmth as some other boots.
pros: Minimal design gives a low profile appearance
Rubber outer shell keeps water out
Wide toe box makes room for thick socks
cons: Toe area is not lined with fur so your toes may get cold

customer_reviews.title: So beyond perfect for our Iceland trip.
customer_reviews.text: So beyond perfect! Both myself and a friend got these for our Oct iceland trip. They are seriously the most comfortable and smartest shoes to wear here or wherever you may have somewhat cold and wet weather. We climbed mountains, walked through crazy deep puddlea, went through waterfalls, miles of just walking in the city. PERFECTLY DRY, WARM AND NO BLISTERS. Best purchase we made.
customer_reviews.author: Cele-heart

customer_reviews.title: I love these, super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these, super cute, and very comfy! I ordered half a size bigger than I usually get but they still fit pretty snug. If you want big thick socks on when wearing them you may need to order a whole size up from your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: ELS

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel but defective
customer_reviews.text: I just love the way these boots look and feel. Unfortunately, after about three weeks they started to leak and when I wear them in wet grass, the toes of my socks get wet. I can't seem to find a way to contact the seller about getting a replacement, so for now I'm just going to leave this review here. Update - I was able to get a new pair from Amazon and the new ones seem to work well - return process went smoothly, new boots seem great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8.5-9, so I purchased the 8.5 and they fit great. These boots are amazing!! It's consistently 10 F here and my feet always stay nice and warm. I haven't gotten any blisters from these, which is surprising because I ALWAYS do, especially from boots. My only issue with them is the tread should be more grippy. When it gets really icy, I have to be very careful where I walk. Overall, I am so happy I purchased these. They aren't too heavy, they look pretty good, and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more insulation.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and fit of the boots. My only wish is that they insulated all the way down through the toe. I was looking for a warm winter snow boot and instead these are more of a cold day rain boot. Warm socks helps, but in general I will they were warmer throughout.
customer_reviews.author: john anderes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes & Price
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer stated. She also bought these for an Alaskan Cruise and they were awesome. I wear somewhere between a 7.5 and 8 and purchased the 8. They were a little roomy but fit well. Some days I wore 2 pairs of socks and some one but my feet were happy and warm but not overly hot and sweaty. My ankles and feet usually swell due to some medical issues but I had zero swelling. Even after walking for miles, hiking in the wet forest, and just wearing them to dinner. I also received a lot of compliments no matter what occasion I wore them at.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, I live where the winter weather is bad. I don't mean like it gets a little cold and there's some snow. We are in the negatives, ice storms, feet of snow, and that's a normal day. I need something I can get on quickly and go outside with my dog. Living in the county means doing everything yourself so I need something that I can count on. These are great for quick trips. I would never wear them in the high snow or for real hard work out side. There are just good, and quick little boots for running around.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Decent low-profile snow boot
customer_reviews.text: I work long days outdoors at a ski area in the winter, so I needed some quality boots. These are very cute and pretty comfy too. They do run a bit large, even when worn with thick socks. They are nice and grippy on ice. They were waterproof for about a month, then started to leak. Also, in deeper than a foot of snow, snow got over the cuff and onto my socks. All these things aside, it's a solid boot, and I much prefer them to the Sorel Joan of Arctic, which I had before. The KEENs are much more comfortable, lower profile, easier to walk in and less clunky indoors.
customer_reviews.author: moonski

customer_reviews.title: My feet are freezing and they cracked after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I am so incredibly disappointed with this boots. Honestly, I cannot figure out how they have so many good ratings. They look cute. That is the only upside. The rubber part of the boot has no lining, so your foot is pressed up against cold rubber. The bottoms are lined, but they are still not warm. My feet are freezing in them when it's only 40 degrees out, and they just get colder as the temperature drops. Plus, after less than a season of use, the seams are cracked/and or leaking, so now they get wet on the inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ithacanfamily

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Just enough room for a pair of thick socks! They keep me warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kjerstin L Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I know Keens to be a great product but for boots that are rated for -4 ̊ ...
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations for how warm these boots would be. I know Keens to be a great product but for boots that are rated for -4 ̊ these are really a disappointment. I wore them out in snow and temps between 5-20 ̊ and my feet were cold almost immediately. They have okay traction, the look cute, and I got a few compliments but I wouldn't wear these for warmth. Definitely not worth $70-$100.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Mogano

customer_reviews.title: Great fit even with high instep
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!!! I have a high instep and was worried that they might be too tight. For size reference, I can’t really wear Tom’s or Vans slip-ons. The fit across the top touches, but doesn’t constrict. Even with wool socks on, they were great. The footbed is supportive and ample, and I love the materials used. I’ll update when I get out in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Simon

customer_reviews.title: These fit great but are NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These fit great but are NOT waterproof! I have eczema and live in a rainy region so it’s important I have dry feet, just spent a day in rainy London in these boots and my feet are drenched and in so much pain. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: JD and SD

customer_reviews.title: Too small, too wide
customer_reviews.text: Even though I ordered a half size larger than usual, this boot is too short, and while supposedly a medium, it was much too wide. Not warm, not lined (just a bit of sherpa-like material at the top), no arch support - not the quality I would expect from the Keen name.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit or shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: My last review cleared before I could post with a photo... hopefully there's no duplicate. Either this product is counterfeit or Keens has some explaining to do regarding the quality of their product. The rubber piece over the toe is cut assymetrically between the two boots and it's rough around the edges. So far what I have is doing fine keeping the moisture from my feet, but I've only warn them a few days, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute, well-made, and would be great for rainy conditions around town, mud, light trails, and on grass. They are not terribly warm (in the foot area) so if you want a great fit and plan on using them for really cold weather, order a size up and maybe put an insulating sole or big sock. I loved them, but I had to return them because in the end the sole is not rugged enough my use case (hiking in rocky terrain). I wanted to keep them just because they are so cute but I went with one of the more rugged/cold weather keens.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of K

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! I have heavy duty winter boots already
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I have heavy duty winter boots already, but I'm taking a trip to NYC and wanted something that was warm, comfortable and not too bulky to walk around in this winter on the streets. The fur lining doesn't go all the way down into the foot of the boot, but there is a soft little pad at the bottom. You could add another liner if you wanted. They are pretty grippy at first, but are true to size and look just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life I am living in a place where it snow. I wanted warm, dry feet and these absolutely deliver. I have been wearing these for the last month. Very comfortable and durable. Boots fit just a little on the large side, no doubt to allow for thicker, winter socks. Good traction through snow and puddles. Just ok on icy sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Peachy Keen :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of boots suitable for winter but also that won't be affected my muddy/salty terrain. These are PERFECT. Easy to clean on the outside, warm and cozy on the inside. And they look super trendy. I am usually size 8-8.5; based on KEEN's website I went 8.5 but probably could have done an 8. It depends how many layers/how thick your socks are.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey22

customer_reviews.title: Solid boots!
customer_reviews.text: These run slightly large, but with inserts and heavy wool socks they were just about right. Otherwise, they are warm, though in near zero degree weather I added toe warmers. For ordinary winter wear in Pacific NW , they are great! Keep my feet dry and don't feel like being trapped in rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Goya Ensor

customer_reviews.title: Versatile comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were the only shoes I took on my winter trip to Europe. I wanted versatile shoes that would adapt to the activities of my vacation. I used them in cities and in snowy mountains. I walked everywhere in these shoes for an average of 8 miles a day. They were very comfortable, specially after couple days. They tend to run large so I added a padding which I often do with my walking shoes. These shoes kept me warm, dry and comfortable even in the snow. They held well during every day use and I rarely had to tie them again. They are very well made and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Maha1

customer_reviews.title: Too small compared to normal Keen sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 so I bought an 8 and my toe was to the very tip, rubbing at the top even, which is a first for me with Keen. There is no insulation in the toe box either, so, for winter warmth, I'd go a whole size up and wear thick socks. They were super cute otherwise. Too bad the price was at least $30 dollars more for the next size up by the time I returned the pair I got so I did not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: agzhl

customer_reviews.title: Happy I Bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have had no luck with regular style muck boots. They don’t have support and aren’t comfortable to wear for a long period of time. THESE ROCK. The fuzzy part around the ankles is cozy and my feet aren’t cramped. They’re comfortable to wear and I love the way they look. Disclaimer- I have not worn them in snow so I do not know if they keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pox

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boots for the winter
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these boots. They are so easy to slip on, and aren't a hassle to tie. I have run around in the snow in them and my feet have stayed dry and warm. I usually wear a 7.5 in Keen shoes, but ordered an 8 in these boots so I can wear thick socks and they fit great. I have wide feet, and the wide toe box doesn't squeeze my toes. I'm planning to order another pair for my daughter so we can both survive the negative temperatures we have been having.
customer_reviews.author: dianne p.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product - wet socks from holes only after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots when I bought them six months ago to wear during Montréal winter. They seemed to be well made, warm and very versatile. However, just SIX months later, I'm noticing my socks are WET after a few hours walking outside in them. There are some small openings in the toe area letting snow in! I don't do crazy hiking or any rough wear of these, just city walking. I am very disappointed in the quality of these boots after paying a premium price. I do not recommend these as they are NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: AShiraishi

customer_reviews.title: Boots won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted one winter before they started to come undone at the seams. For a pair of boots that cost over $100, that is unacceptable. This is the 2nd Keen product I’ve purchased that has lasted less than two years. They’re smart to have a one year warranty. Their products all fall apart after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable, and less bulky than I expected
customer_reviews.text: So cute, so comfortable, and less bulky than I expected. I wasn't sure how they'd be for warmth given the canvas / rubber footing, but they're great. They look adorable with pretty much anything and they feel like a hug for your feet. Even in temperate california these are my new favorite winter shoes. Super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, they came just as pictured and are ...
customer_reviews.text: Good boots, they came just as pictured and are tightly waterproof. They keep my feet warm. I usually go between size 6 or 7, and I ordered a size 7 due to a lot of the comments suggesting a size up. It was slightly too big even with socks on. I will try to find fluffier socks to mitigate the issue. But the boots arrived in good condition and has been very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Annie L.

customer_reviews.title: feet dry and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I bought these boots because we were headed to Alaska and I wanted my feet to be dry and comfy......mission accomplished! I have always liked the fit of Keens, so I felt good about buying them on line. My only sadness is that they squeak a little as I walk. Kind of bothered me after a while, but my feet were perfectly comfortable and dry. I bought a half size bigger to make sure I could wear warm socks and put an insert in also. I love these boots. I hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason I was able to nab these Keens for $65, regular $120. I love Keens, the owner of 9 pair. No exception with these. Out of the box and off to work all day in a flooded area and they were a champ. Super dry feet with no soreness or blisters anywhere. The quality is definitely there and I love the way they fit my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Lots of glue
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these boots and agree with others that Keen just isn't making shoes like they used to. The fit was fine. However, the black part of the rubber is not glued in well at all. You can see the glue and see that with the first rain, the sole will split away. Returned them 10 minutes after trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Falln2summer

customer_reviews.title: In love with these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots and now have 2 pair. They are great quality & I walk four miles a day in them, that are holding up & are comfortable. Feet can get a little sweaty, but they are waterproof, after all. The black and white pair are adorable and I get compliments on them all the time. The white is really white. The sizing is right for me, I wear a 9 in regular shoes and a 9 in this boot. (I wear a 10 in running shoes.)
customer_reviews.author: LSchono

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark blue pair and they look exactly like they do in the picture. They are very comfortable and keep my feet super warm. They are a bit large but fit perfectly with some wool socks. The only downside is they don't have super great traction, a bit slippery on ice. Overall I love them and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne L

customer_reviews.title: This boot is in keeping with the look and feel and I really love them. I live in MN where the winters ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably own 6 or 7 pair of Keens. These boots are in keeping with the look, feel and quality of Keen and I really love them. I live in MN where the winters are extremely cold so do NOT plan to use these as my ice fishing or winter walking boots, but expect to wear them for quick trips in the cold. The only thing that keeps me from giving a five is that I feel the size is a bit off. I almost always wear an 8 and I needed an 8.5 in this style.
customer_reviews.author: ram bro

customer_reviews.title: Typical Keen, typical quality, typical comfort.  Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these and they fit absolutely perfect. She is now hoping we go somewhere cold and snowy this summer so she can wear them, but if not, at least she'll get a chance this winter. I'll update this review this upcoming winter, but these are Keens; we have a dozen pair between us and we've never been disappointed over 15 years of Keen-happiness
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bachman

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Just received these boots and... I AM IN LOVE. They are super high quality and seem like they will hold up. I am an athletic trainer and I was looking for a pair of boots that would be warm and durable during the cold part of my football and baseball seasons but that were also super stylish. These are both. Can't wait to wear them tomorrow night during our first cold football game!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My feet are sensitive to friction and I love that KEENs tend to be a tad wider
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of KEEN boots. I have a pair of hiking boots by KEEN in a size 8 and figured that the sizing would transfer over to these as well, which they did. Warm, comfy, a bit squeeky when you first wear them but that's ok. My feet are sensitive to friction and I love that KEENs tend to be a tad wider, making them the most comfortable boot option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Steele

customer_reviews.title: They leak!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad. I only got one good season out of these boots before they started leaking! I have no idea where the water escapes through the exterior, but not matter how little time I spend in the rain or snow, my feet always end up wet. It's really unfortunate since I loved these boots, but man, one season is way too short a time for $90 boots to be lasting.
customer_reviews.author: writenow

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a woman's foot, not heavy or clunky.
customer_reviews.text: They are built for a woman's foot - smaller toe box and heel cup. Not heavy or clunky like most winter boots. And even though the fleece doesn't extend to the foot of the boot, my feet stay warm and dry. The past 2 weeks in Chicago have been a great test for these boots and I highly recommend them. Plus, they are adorable. Love the yellow laces and soles - they make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: alexisfromtexas

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot! Runs a little large!
customer_reviews.text: Boot were great as far as length. Were a little big over all. I think they will work great with a boot sock. Love the colors! Support felt good when I tried them on, but have not worn them anywhere yet.
customer_reviews.author: picassojilly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my girlfriend. Her feet are like mine with narrow heels and wide at the ball of the foot. Keen shoes fit me great, so I thought I get these for her to try. She loves them! They fit her great with a little extra room in front. Most women shoes are too narrow for her. They provide great comfort and support for all day walking. As an added bonus I can't tell you how many women have complemented her on the boots. Strangers have come up to as we are walking past and have said to her, "I love your boots!".
customer_reviews.author: garlo

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a pair of boots wide enough!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! A pair of boots wide enough! After surgery on my feet it's been hell trying to find a pair of boots wide enough to be worn comfortably. I usually wear a 10 and ordered an 11 hoping it wouldn't be like other manufacturers and be too narrow. Perfect fit! Very light weight too! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very comfortable, just like the other Keens in my closet
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable, just like the other Keens in my closet. They're a smidge big, in my regular size, requiring a liner sock for a better fit. I've been wearing these boots, almost daily, since the middle of December. Unfortunately, one of the boots has sprung a leak. The return policy states that only unworn shoes are accepted as a return. At this point, I can't say if I would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, won't make your feet look too big!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have purchased. The first one was for myself, and my teen daughter kept wearing them, so I just purchased another pair for her. They are warm and light weight, and if you have a larger foot (mine is size 9), then they don't make your foot look HUGE while wearing (like my Sorel's do!). They are cute enough and light weight enough to pair with leggings and a sweater for indoor wear. I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was my fault but happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these boots. Haven't tested them out in extreme winter conditions yet but will update this after I do. I typically wear a 9 1/2 and these are a little big on me. So I should've gotten a 9. This is my first pair of KEEN shoes though so maybe their sizing is a little different. I would recommend trying them in store and then purchasing them here on Amazon. I looked at REI and Scheels and these boots were $130!! Bought them online here for $100. Saved some money!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Alt

customer_reviews.title: These could use a pull tab on either side of the boot for us old folks.
customer_reviews.text: I want boots that zip, but they are no longer available. I buy Keens for the large toe box for bunions and hammer toes, but I have a hard time getting them on because I also have a high arch. The boots aren’t as warm as I thought they would be. But, they are well made and comfortable, once I get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Shashie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this boot for hiking in snow in Switzerland and my feet were warm and dry! Over the course of 16 days I walked well over 150 miles and had no issues with arch support. The boots are very comfortable, lightweight and look good!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! As a young mom in Utah who spends a lot of time outside in all weather, these boots are perfect for late fall and winter. They're super cute with leggings but still very functional, which is difficult to find! I've never had cold feet while wearing them, even when walking around outside for several hours in the cold, and they're very cushioned, which makes them extremely comfortable. I went up a half size to leave room for thick socks, and that was perfect - I have plenty of room for when I wear wool socks, but they're not too loose if I'm wearing regular socks.
customer_reviews.author: treeflower

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love my Keens! These are a great light weight shoe. I was looking for something warm enough to wear in the snow but not so warm that my feet would sweat throughout the day. I can wear them all day at work and shovel the drive way when I get home without needing to trade out shoes. I’ve had them for a few months now and no signs of wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: Tducks

customer_reviews.title: These boots are awesome!! I have a wide foot and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome!! I have a wide foot and they fit great! They are so cute!! I wear a 6.5 and that's what I ordered. I am online looking at the other colors to possible order another pair! You wont be disappointed. This is the first review I have ever written, that's how much I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Quality less than ideal
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but quality wise I expected much more. Visually there’s a lack of quality and I highly doubt they are going to hold up long at all. First 5 minutes I wore them the rubber got horribly scuffed just walking in the grocery store. Not high quality rubber/materials.
customer_reviews.author: mell0wmadness

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled across these boots through a simple search for waterproof footwear. I've always had good luck with Keens and liked the colors/designs offered on these boots. I live in the PNW, so real water protection is a necessary feature - these boots deliver! The boots are comfortable, warm and really cute. That being said, this model of boot is flat-soled and would not be ideal for anyone requiring arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scapes

customer_reviews.title: if you're looking for something for a little warmer of a climate thats very wet these would work great. Excellent water proofing but didn't stand up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots, I got a lot of compliments for the style but they unfortunately did not protect my feet very well from the cold. It claims that it's supposed to keep you warm down to -4F but after spending 5 minutes outside during a 20F night I ended up getting frost nip on my toes. However, if you're looking for something for a little warmer of a climate thats very wet these would work great. Excellent water proofing but didn't stand up to a mild Anchorage winter. So sad, I really wanted to love these.
customer_reviews.author: Big Booty Judy

customer_reviews.title: In love with these.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy I purchased these!!! I bought them for a trip to Colorado and I wear them at home too when it's cold. They are so cute and comfortable. I get compliments on them daily. Im bummed for summer to come because I will miss wearing them. I'm usually an 7 1/2, and I ordered an 8 to accommodate thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: TDow

customer_reviews.title: Warm for Iceland
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Iceland in November and they were perfectly warm and comfortable! Not at all heavy in comparison to most hiking shoes. Easy to pull on and lace up! Not a whole lot of ankle support, but once you double up on socks, it’s a snug fit. I also ordered half a size up to account for extra socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Wish I hadn't waited so long to order. I work both inside and outside (overseeing a large scale vegetable garden and chicken flock for a juvenile probation department) and these boots are stylish as well as functional. I have recommended these particular boots to family and friends as the quality is wonderful & my feet are toasty warm & dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Schlie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots for about a year now and they are already leaking! They also do not keep the heat in very well. Very disappointing for the price of these boots and very surprising considering the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Katie N.

customer_reviews.title: I love them, I've gotten a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I've gotten a lot of compliments. They worked perfect for me during the rainy winter in SC, however, If you are looking for a cold weather boot, this shoe only has insulation in the ankle area and your feet will freeze. The thickness of the rubber around the feet is comparable to a normal rain boot. There is zero arch support in this shoe as well, I just used my regular inserts if I was planning on doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jan A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality boots!
customer_reviews.text: These Keen boots are gorgeous! I've wore them a couple times in the snow and they are warm and cozy. I wear a 10 normally and that's what I bought. They are true to size. The quality of the boots is evident. I'm very pleased with them and plan on buying more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: happyrunner

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable but not very warm.
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and comfortable. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it is not well insulated around the toes. Living in Wyoming I was hoping for a boot that was a little warmer that I could wear when there wasn't much snow. I am keeping them because I do like the way they look and they'll do for 30 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: TaniaIdes10

customer_reviews.title: Favorite boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots a super cute and eye-catching! I get compliments on them everywhere I go and they are insanely comfortable. I want to wear them all year round! They are waterproof and quite warm. They are true to size but I can still get a thick sock in them comfortably and with ease. I'm so glad I purchased these, they are such great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Purchased them to go on anAlaskan Cruise. They worked out great! Was raining all day in Skagway and they were put to the test! Went in a boat and hiked about 2 miles in Juneau. My foot is wide and they were very roomy-I wore 2 pairs of socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Plastic boots (NO leather)
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Do not buy these if you think your getting leather boots! They are genuine plastic that make your feet sweat! The discription said leather and synthetic???? There is not one stitch of leather, it's a complete lie.
customer_reviews.author: nancy a

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but still love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but I don't think the top is waterproof. That's no bueno for me when it snows like crazy! That doesn't happen too often but these may not work well outside playing in the snow. Also, they can squeak on some surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive boots that I'm excited about wearing to Norway! I plan to look GOOD on that dog sled! Addendum: served me very well in Norway, protecting me from deep snow and from slipping on the ice. My feet stayed warm. And I DID look good on that dog sled. I could not have been happier with this pair of boots. First-rate!
customer_reviews.author: AL FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and the color is pretty right on
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is wearing these things now, but I legit had da need for waterproof boots, so say what you will. Killer deal on these shoes, and they are worth 4 times what I paid. Super comfortable and the color is pretty right on. Feminine without looking like every other stuck up college girl out there.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots. Durable, warm, and super cute. My only critique is they are a little wide once the fluff inside breaks down. Wish the footbed was a little more narrow/fitted. But other than that, great boot!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boot and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boot and so cute! The first day I got them I wore them around the all day just to see how comfortable they were. VERY! Quality is great, but then I'd expect nothing less from Keen. I own multiple pairs of Keen shoes, my favorite are the Venice sandal. You get what you pay for and these are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot IMAGINE how Keen considers these waterproof: only the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot IMAGINE how Keen considers these waterproof: only the bottom part would qualify as such because once the laces start the rain goes right through. Also doesn't have the fabulous support I buy the Keen's for so this is my first absolute flop in my Keen collection.
customer_reviews.author: Book Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and perfect warmth for mild winter weather and ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I was hoping for and more. Super comfy and perfect warmth for mild winter weather and walking in slop. I am ordered a 9 which is my usual size and they fit a tad roomy. Perfect for a thicker sock
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Klatt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I purchased these
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that the boots would be too tight/small, as I ordered my normal size & have wider feet. But these fit great! There's room to wear thicker socks, & I get so many compliments on them! They're very cute. I absolutely love the laces, as silly as that sounds; I do not foresee them wearing out any time soon! So far still fully water proof (at least until the clothe starts around the ankle) after a winter season in Wisconsin! Would certainly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable, stylish, and great for my walks to work in the winter. I tried them on in a shoe store first before buying online. I normally wear an 8 and I wear an 8.5 in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: In love with these boots
customer_reviews.text: In love with these boots. Great for days when they're is old snow on the ground and it's mucky. Easy to wipe clean! And comfy to wear for long periods of time. I did noticed they had to be broken in a bit, but it wasn't long.
customer_reviews.author: PoKeyFam

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have back issue and walk to work. These are amazing. So comfortable. Bottom grip well. I have used them for 2 Midwest winters. No wet socks and cold feet. And they also look so.cute with jeans and leggings. What not to love?
customer_reviews.author: NaN

customer_reviews.title: Best snow boots I've ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing. I'm normally an 8 1/2 so that is what I ordered and they fit great. I've worn them all week in this freezing east coast snow and they have kept my feet both dry and warm. I would totally buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Eirene

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable enough to wear all day, my feet didn’t get too hot. My feet stay dry and they look so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Deena Karnes

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe purchase in years
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shoe. They are warm, well made, interesting looking, and truly water proof. They fit me perfectly and kept my feet warm many of winter nights. I pretty much wear them every day and have never had an issue with water getting in. They are absolutely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eunoia_1323

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, but they are NOT winter books. There isn't any insulation what so ever in the foot area. So if you're looking for a warm boot. These are not it. I live in Alaska and with the unseasonably cold winter we've had this year I wouldn't wear these outside for very long. These however will be great when we get up into the 30's. Good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots, just a little wide.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because they were slightly too big, and a little wide. I read the other reviews and decided to go up a half size, they will be just right with a pair a good, thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Keen! I have several pairs of their shoes, and I love them all. I especially like the round toe box, and that there is alway enough room width wise. I usually need a size 10, but went up a half size with these boots to fit heavy boot socks. I find Keen shoes to be my best choice for comfort and style.
customer_reviews.author: SmtShopper

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit was slightly on the large size. Would have to wear extra heavy socks. The quality of the boot was not as expected. The faux fur lining on the top of the boot does not extend into the insole. With no lining on the insole, the boot would not be good for snow/cold weather. Also, the fabric pattern on each boot does not match each other. It looks like the boots are mismatched. See photo. Returning these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like other reviewers have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: They work well for the host-daughter, she bought them for the winter weather we have. Warm, cute, and well made. Only downside is, like other reviewers have mentioned, that the shoes are not that great on ice. But overall she doesn't walk on a ton of ice so they do well for her going to school and such.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Function and Fashion
customer_reviews.text: They're functional, but they have a different and more appealing style from most winter boots. The style is great and they're comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not warm
customer_reviews.text: It's such a super cute boot and was looking for a while before investing on a pair of winter boots. Chicago has brutal winters at times and while the shoes are waterproof and slip resistant, they are not warm. I wore them on a low 30 degree day and it was awful. These boots only carry 100 g of insulation and normally its recommended 400g and higher for winter. I kept the boot because I already had used them but was a bit disappointed because I was looking for warmth more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Proud of this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot. Excellent quality. Love the fit. I bought this boot a half size up and they're very roomy. One of the reasons why I love this boot is because it comes in a 10.5 which is a rarity. I could have gone with the 10 but added measure for thick socks. Over all I am very proud of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Rose

customer_reviews.title: Keen's Winter Boot
customer_reviews.text: I really feel good about ordering Keen boots or shoes. This boot is roomy enough for warm socks, which I need in the Wisconsin winters. We get some pretty cold weather here. The boot looks very nice and feels wonderful on. Thank you Keen for making wonderful wearing apparel.
customer_reviews.author: Crickie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style in a Waterproof Boot doesn't get any better than this!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and style in a waterproof boot doesn't get any better than this! Wish the Navy blue was still available in Size 7! Then I'd have all Three of these colorful, rugged yet stylish boots that go with everything outdoors or just cold weather!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sch.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got them
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these forever and finally at a price that you couldn't beat! So glad I got them. My feet are toasty on my first day of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wet and cold weather shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are fast becoming my favorite winter boots. They keep my feet perfectly warm and dry--even in drenching wet, cold weather--and are comfortable to walk in for hours. They aren't the sleekest of style but I'll take comfort and functionality over style when dealing with the wet and cold. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Very comfy and stylish. First boots I've owned that my feet don't get cold in which is huge! Thank you! Only thing is they "crinkle" on the plaid part when you walk. Kind of weird. Otherwise, great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Worked well while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These were a great boot for 11.5 months. They were comfortable as i wanted a shoe that would accommodate an arch support. They were warm for the most part with a wool insert and thick socks. Towards the end of their life, they started to leak and then eventually tore along the seam between the upper and the sole.
customer_reviews.author: SKM

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Barn Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great winter barn boot. Warm and waterproof. I like the tread...it doesn't pick up all the barn crud like a lug sole
customer_reviews.author: Ohhorses

customer_reviews.title: Swill Alps Approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to wear on a trip to Switzerland, and they were perfect! Kept my feet warm the whole time we were in the mountains!
customer_reviews.author: Annie03

customer_reviews.title: The Keen toebox is always pretty wide, but if you've worn Keens before they ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a week+ straight, it was cold and wet and they kept me so warm, dry, and cute! I wore them with tall boot socks and was plenty warm in damp 30 deg F weather. The Keen toebox is always pretty wide, but if you've worn Keens before they fit the same as my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: kmm05k

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes and super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes and super cute! Used them in both snow and slush and they kept my feet dry and warm. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Betancourt Lizcano

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Second year wearing these in winter. Took me awhile to break in...but I love them! My feet are warm and comfy. I plan on purchasing another color.
customer_reviews.author: Not Joe.

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED WITH FIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second keen shoes. My first lasted 6yrs, not sure about the duration of this one. Looks beautiful and feels warm, but the fit could be better. I find that this keen is so closely fitted with socks, that their is no wiggle space. Unfortunately, I wore it once, so I'm stuck with it. Bummer!!! If your foot is narrow, perfect for you, however, if it's wide like mine, then you'll have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ISLAND GURL

customer_reviews.title: So cute, super waterproof - not warm
customer_reviews.text: Love how cute these boots are! I get a ton of compliments on them and adore their appearance. They are also fantastically waterproof and I have now worn them for about two weeks in the snow and slush. However, they are not warm and on cold days, my toes are freezing even with warm socks. They are also much wider than I would have believed. Not sure if ordering a size down would have helped but I would consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great.. They are super comfy and warm.... Functional for everyday wear... Cute style... They are great to wear in the rain... Keeping your feet dry... I love my new winter boots!! The only thing is These boots were not true to size, I got a size 9 and they feel about 1/2 size bigger than normal. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: XeliRose

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the boots-they were cute and were supposed to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the boots-they were cute and were supposed to be waterproof , but 2 months after receiving them it started snowing hard here in Michigan. After a few walks in the snow, one of the boots developed a crack on a seam and my foot gets wet and cold now
customer_reviews.author: Amy Knauf

product_meta.title: Keen Women's Elsa Waterproof Winter Boot
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Waterproof pu leather and textile upper repels water in different weather conditions
Seam-sealed waterproof protection for dry comfort
Sherpa collar and mesh lining for stylish warmth and breathability
Heat-reflecting strobel provides a thermal barrier for protection
